Text: I get a error = The name/key you entered does not appear to be valid. Please try again...

Install.
Open ZD Soft Screen Recorder.
Open Keygen.
Copy  "Hardware fingerprint"  and paste to HWID.
Type your name[any name] then click Generate.
Use both name and key to activate.

Wtf man! The instructions are very easy!Watch screenshots!
Attention! Your "Hardware fingerprint" is not 1111-2222,is different from computer to computer.

It is working perfectly. I tested in Windows XP, Windows 7 and Windows 8. Follow the instructions of Uploader.

Thanks, BySenzati!!
